attributes.action: stop xfactor from releasing a cover of "don't stop believin'" by journey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to ask the prime minister to please block any attempt by xfactor (the ITV show) to release (that is, destroy) the legendary song "don't stop believin'" by journey by any means neccesary, including military action.

This is not intended to be humerous, this is a serious threat to our culture and the culture of america.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
